Title: Establishes a cause of action for injunction and damages for unlawful surveillance; damages for injuries sustained by reason of unlawful surveillance
Summary: Establishes a cause of action to prevent and restrict unlawful surveillance; allows recovery of damages for injuries sustained by reason of unlawful surveillance; provides the jury may award exemplary damages.
LawCode: Amd ยง51, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to establishing a cause of action for injunction and damages for unlawful surveillance
